contact-subtitle: Have questions, suggestions, or need help? We're here to assist you.
subject: Subject
message-placeholder: Please describe your question, issue, or suggestion in detail. The more information you provide, the better we can help you.
message-sent-success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact-types: What can we help you with?
general-questions-desc: Questions about our tools, features, or how to use them effectively.
bug-reports-desc: Found something that's not working correctly? Let us know so we can fix it.
feature-suggestions-desc: Have ideas for new tools or improvements? We'd love to hear them.
partnerships-desc: Interested in collaborating or integrating our tools? Get in touch.
how-accurate-tools: How accurate are your timestamp conversion tools?
accuracy-answer: Our tools use industry-standard algorithms and are tested extensively. All conversions are mathematically precise and handle edge cases like leap years and timezone transitions correctly.
free-service-answer: Yes! All our timestamp tools and resources are completely free to use. There are no hidden fees, registration requirements, or usage limits.
data-privacy: How do you handle my data and privacy?
privacy-answer: We prioritize your privacy. All timestamp conversions happen locally in your browser - we don't store or transmit your data. Check our Privacy Policy for complete details.
mobile-support: Do your tools work on mobile devices?
mobile-answer: Absolutely! Our website is fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices, tablets, and desktops. You can use all our tools on any device with a web browser.
